doc_id: STEERCO-AUGUST 2025 — SMARTONBOARDX STEERING COMMITTEE MEETING MINUTES-3
text:
August marked SmartOnboardX’s most turbulent month since launch. Two enterprise customers—Acme Tech and Delta Logistics—experienced onboarding and latency breakdowns that threatened over $800 K ARR. Engineering and Customer Success diverted major capacity to crisis management.
 Despite service strain, core platform adoption remained above 70 % across the portfolio, showing product value was intact even under stress.
source_path: D:\CUE_\Data sets\Steerco minutes\AUGUST 2025 — SMARTONBOARDX STEERING COMMITTEE MEETING MINUTES.docx
